objects.specification: A large flat exhibition floor panel with a smooth, polished surface and subtle matte finish. The neutral gray tone provides a modern, unobtrusive base for highlighting all displayed elements. The floor is designed to support heavy objects and ensure a seamless, level walking area with no visible seams.

A tall vertical panel with a neutral off-white matte finish and clean, sharp edges. The wall has a modern, minimalistic look with a smooth texture suitable for mounting promotional graphics or branding elements. It provides a sturdy enclosure and refined backdrop.

A tall vertical panel with a neutral off-white matte finish and clean, sharp edges. The wall has a modern, minimalistic look with a smooth texture suitable for mounting promotional graphics or branding elements. It provides a sturdy enclosure and refined backdrop.

A realistic modern mid-size demo car in a vibrant red finish with detailed body panels, tinted windows, chrome trim, and realistic tires. The design shows smooth curves, defined headlights, grille details, and an elegant aerodynamic silhouette suitable for 360-degree viewing.

A sleek reception desk with a warm wooden finish and smooth curved front edge. It has a clean minimalist silhouette, integrated cable management, and a subtly recessed top surface for brochures or digital displays. The welcoming tone invites guest interaction.

A tall slim pedestal display stand with a bright golden finish. It features a flat top surface and clean vertical edges, designed to prominently showcase promotional materials or small car components at eye level.

A large rectangular promotional banner with vibrant car branding graphics. The design features high-resolution logos, slogans, and product imagery on a smooth, slightly glossy substrate. Edges are cleanly finished.

A small round coffee table with a warm wooden top and slender metal legs. The modern minimalist design features a smooth finish and subtle bevel on the tabletop edge, ideal for casual conversations or leaflet placement.
A comfortable lounge chair with a plush cushioned seat, curved backrest, and slender metal legs. The upholstery is a soft neutral fabric, combining style and ergonomic support for visitors.
